subject: [cc-community] CC BY SA music on TempoStand
body:
Hi,
 
We have recently launched our online music portal called TempoStand. It is a platform for promoting independent artists in India. All the music parked on TempoStand is Creative Commons BY-SA license. People are free to stream music online. They can also download music or buy a CD by paying for it and mix it and then share it. 

 
We have recently released our first album called - Lights. It is light fusion music with some folk and instrumentals. You can listen to the tracks at www.tempostand.com
 
We are not specific to any genre. The more experimental the music, the more we love it. There are plenty of other features we are going to release soon. You can go to tempostand.com/updates
 to view our blog. We were wondering as to how important in terms of creative freedom, is it to offer music download for free? and if we do go ahead and make it free for download, how would it affect us in terms of revenue? I mean would many folks buy  CD? I say that because thats one way we intend to support our artists. We also intend to sell merchandise so music is not the only thing but still we would like to hear some arguments pro or against the idea. 

 
Looking forward to your feedback. 
 
Thanks
Ujjwal Grover

TempoStand.com--
code and music _.-.
